notes.text:
This update for tiff fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2015-8781, CVE-2015-8782, CVE-2015-8783: Out-of-bounds writes for invalid images (bsc#964225)
- CVE-2015-7554: Out-of-bounds Write in the thumbnail and tiffcmp tools (bsc#960341)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: The _TIFFVGetField function in tif_dir.c in libtiff 4.0.6 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid memory write and crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via crafted field data in an extension tag in a TIFF image.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: tif_luv.c in libtiff allows attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds write) via an invalid number of samples per pixel in a LogL compressed TIFF image, a different vulnerability than CVE-2015-8782.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
